start.title: Open Mat
start.text: You enter the dojo for an open mat session. You see several training partners available for rolls. Who do you want to roll with first?

whiteBeltRoll.title: White Belt Roll
whiteBeltRoll.text: You start rolling with a white belt. They attempt a basic guard pass. How do you respond?

blueBeltRoll.title: Blue Belt Roll
blueBeltRoll.text: You start rolling with a blue belt. They attempt a submission from side control. How do you respond?

purpleBeltRoll.title: Purple Belt Roll
purpleBeltRoll.text: You start rolling with a purple belt. They attempt to take your back. How do you respond?

choices.text: Use the Trap and Roll Escape

upaEscapeTest.title: Upa Escape Test
upaEscapeTest.text: Let's see if you can perform the Upa Escape correctly.

elbowEscapeTest.title: Elbow Escape Test
elbowEscapeTest.text: Let's see if you can perform the Elbow Escape correctly.

hipEscapeTest.title: Hip Escape Test
hipEscapeTest.text: Let's see if you can perform the Hip Escape correctly.

kneeEscapeTest.title: Knee Escape Test
kneeEscapeTest.text: Let's see if you can perform the Knee Escape correctly.

trapAndRollEscapeTest.title: Trap and Roll Escape Test
trapAndRollEscapeTest.text: Let's see if you can perform the Trap and Roll Escape correctly.

shrimpEscapeTest.title: Shrimp Escape Test
shrimpEscapeTest.text: Let's see if you can perform the Shrimp Escape correctly.

whiteBeltRollSuccess.title: White Belt Roll Success
whiteBeltRollSuccess.text: You successfully defended against the white belt's attack. Do you want to continue rolling or move on to another partner?

choices.text: Continue rolling with the white belt

blueBeltRollSuccess.title: Blue Belt Roll Success
blueBeltRollSuccess.text: You successfully defended against the blue belt's attack. Do you want to continue rolling or move on to another partner?

choices.text: Continue rolling with the blue belt

purpleBeltRollSuccess.title: Purple Belt Roll Success
purpleBeltRollSuccess.text: You successfully defended against the purple belt's attack. Do you want to continue rolling or move on to another partner?

choices.text: Continue rolling with the purple belt

test.title: Test Your Skills
test.text: Let's see if you can perform the technique correctly.

testFailed.title: Test Failed
testFailed.text: You failed the move test. The story ends here.
